languages.text: Глаза мои видели канонира, мерно бьющего гаечным ключом по лежащему в укладке снаряду главного калибра, и нутро {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатора{/g}, в сплетении проводов которого угадывались невозможным образом поместившиеся туда кровоточащие останки {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}технопровидца{/g}. Как много ужаса... Как мало надежды.

traits.locale_text: Глаза мои видели канонира, мерно бьющего гаечным ключом по лежащему в укладке снаряду главного калибра, и нутро когитатора, в сплетении проводов которого угадывались невозможным образом поместившиеся туда кровоточащие останки технопровидца. Как много ужаса... Как мало надежды.

languages.text: With my own eyes I saw a gunner steadily hitting a large-calibre shell with a wrench, and, inside a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}, I could just make out the bloody remains of an {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g}, impossibly squeezed in among the tangled wires. So much horror... So little hope.
languages.original_text: Глаза мои видели канонира, мерно бьющего гаечным ключом по лежащему в укладке снаряду главного калибра, и нутро {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатора{/g}, в сплетении проводов которого угадывались невозможным образом поместившиеся туда кровоточащие останки {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}технопровидца{/g}. Как много ужаса... Как мало надежды.

traits.locale_text: With my own eyes I saw a gunner steadily hitting a large-caliber shell with a wrench, and, inside a cogitator, I could just make out the bloody remains of an enginseer, impossibly squeezed in among the tangled wires. So much horror... So little hope.

With my own eyes I saw a gunner steadily hitting a large-caliber shell with a wrench, and, inside a cogitator, I could just make out the bloody remains of an enginseer, impossibly squeezed in among the tangled wires. So much horror... So little hope.

With my own eyes I saw a gunner steadily hitting a large-caliber shell with a wrench, and, inside a cogitator, I could just make out the bloody remains of an enginseer, impossibly squeezed in among the tangled wires. So much horror... So little hope.

With my own eyes I saw a gunner steadily hitting a large-calibre shell with a wrench, and, inside a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}, I could just make out the bloody remains of an {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}enginseer{/g}, impossibly squeezed in among the tangled wires. So much horror... So little hope.

languages.text: Vi con mis propios ojos a un artillero que golpeaba repetidamente un proyectil de gran calibre con su llave y, en el interior de un {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g}, logré vislumbrar los sanguinolentos restos de un {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}visioingeniero{/g}, embutidos entre los cables enmarañados. Cuántos horrores... y cuán poca esperanza.
languages.original_text: With my own eyes I saw a gunner steadily hitting a large-calibre shell with a wrench, and, inside a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}, I could just make out the bloody remains of an {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g}, impossibly squeezed in among the tangled wires. So much horror... So little hope.

traits.locale_text: Vi con mis propios ojos a un artillero que golpeaba repetidamente un proyectil de gran calibre con su llave y, en el interior de un {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g}, logré vislumbrar los sanguinolentos restos de un {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}visioingeniero{/g}, embutidos entre los cables enmarañados. Cuántos horrores... y cuán poca esperanza.

languages.text: 我亲眼看到一个炮手抄着扳手，一下一下地砸着一枚大口径炮弹。我还看到某个{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}沉思者{/g}里被塞进了某位{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}引擎先知{/g}鲜血淋漓的尸体，以近似不可能的方式，挤在纠缠在一起的电线之中。恐怖无处不在……希望如此渺茫。
languages.original_text: With my own eyes I saw a gunner steadily hitting a large-calibre shell with a wrench, and, inside a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}, I could just make out the bloody remains of an {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g}, impossibly squeezed in among the tangled wires. So much horror... So little hope.

traits.locale_text: 我亲眼看到一个炮手抄着扳手，一下一下地砸着一枚大口径炮弹。我还看到某个{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}思考器{/g}里被塞进了某位{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}引擎先知{/g}鲜血淋漓的尸体，以近似不可能的方式，挤在纠缠在一起的电线之中。恐怖无处不在……希望如此渺茫。

languages.text: 砲手が曲がった大口径の砲弾を、着実に当たっている様子をこの目で見た。それに{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}の内部では、絡まったワイヤーの間にあり得ないほど押し込まれた、{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}機関整備師{/g}の血まみれの残骸も確認できた。何という恐怖…希望はほぼ皆無だ。
languages.original_text: With my own eyes I saw a gunner steadily hitting a large-calibre shell with a wrench, and, inside a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}, I could just make out the bloody remains of an {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g}, impossibly squeezed in among the tangled wires. So much horror... So little hope.

traits.locale_text: 砲手が曲がった大口径の砲弾を、着実に当たっている様子をこの目で見た。それに{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}の内部では、絡まったワイヤーの間にあり得ないほど押し込まれた、{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}機関整備師{/g}の血まみれの残骸も確認できた。何という恐怖…希望はほぼ皆無だ。

languages.text: Mit meinen eigenen Augen sah ich, wie ein Kanonier unablässig mit einem Schraubenschlüssel auf eine großkalibrige Granate einschlug, und in einem {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Kogitator{/g} konnte ich gerade noch die blutigen Überreste eines {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Ingenieurs{/g} erkennen, der sich unmöglich zwischen den verwickelten Drähten hindurchquetschen konnte. So viel Grauen... Und so wenig Hoffnung.
languages.original_text: With my own eyes I saw a gunner steadily hitting a large-calibre shell with a wrench, and, inside a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}, I could just make out the bloody remains of an {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g}, impossibly squeezed in among the tangled wires. So much horror... So little hope.

languages.text: De mes propres yeux, j'ai vu un mitrailleur frapper inlassablement un obus de gros calibre avec une clé à molette. À l'intérieur d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g}, j'ai pu distinguer les restes sanglants d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}technaugure{/g}, enchevêtré d'une manière inimaginable dans les câbles. Tant d'horreur... Si peu d'espoir.
languages.original_text: With my own eyes I saw a gunner steadily hitting a large-calibre shell with a wrench, and, inside a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}, I could just make out the bloody remains of an {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g}, impossibly squeezed in among the tangled wires. So much horror... So little hope.

traits.locale_text: De mes propres yeux, j'ai vu un mitrailleur frapper inlassablement un obus de gros calibre avec une clé à molette. À l'intérieur d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g}, j'ai pu distinguer les restes sanglants d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}technaugure{/g}, enchevêtré d'une manière inimaginable dans les câbles. Tant d'horreur... Si peu d'espoir.

languages.text: Bir topçunun elinde kurbağacık anahtarla yüksek kalibre bir bombaya bıkmadan usanmadan vuruşunu gördüm. {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Kavramsayarın{/g} birbirine dolanmış kabloları arasına mümkün olmayan bir şekilde sıkışmış bir {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Mühedyum'un{/g} kanlar içindeki cesedini seçebiliyordum. Çok fazla dehşet... Çok az umut.
languages.original_text: With my own eyes I saw a gunner steadily hitting a large-calibre shell with a wrench, and, inside a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}, I could just make out the bloody remains of an {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g}, impossibly squeezed in among the tangled wires. So much horror... So little hope.

traits.locale_text: Bir silah sorumlusunun, yüksek kalibre bir bombaya bir tamir aletiyle düzenli olarak vuruşuna kendi gözlerimle şahit oldum. {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Kavramsayar{/g}ın birinin içindeki kabloların arasına mümkün olmayan bir şekilde sıkışmış bir {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}mühedyum{/g}un kanlar içindeki kalıntılarını gördüm. Çok fazla dehşet, çok az umut gördüm.
